name: Slay the City
description:
This game was created as part of the Vampire: The Masquerade Jam.

It’s a simple card prototype meant to tell a simple story. Follow an ancient vampire who has just awakened and burn down the city, destroying the vampires in it while trying to remember why she was betrayed.

The mechanics are based on Slay the Spire and Monster Train along with others. Given the timeframe for its development, it is likely to crash and be unstable.
